product_name: Custom Correct Custom Correct Hurricane Ridge Map
long_description: Route your trip from Lake Mills, Badger Valley, Blue Mountain to Lake Aldwell. This 22 1/2 x 14 1/2-inch flat topographical map indicates elevations in feet and road distances in miles and kilometers. Also includes a detailed view of the Hurricane Ridge Visitor Center area.
short_description: Route your trip from Lake Mills, Badger Valley, Blue Mountain to Lake Aldwell.
